title: Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Shape Effect Pull on High Rise Straight Leg Jean Standard
description: STYLE - Comfort waist pull on jean sits at natural waistline providing the coverage and flexability you want in a slim straight body.
VERSATILITY - Pairs great with all tops from shirts and blouses to novelty tees and all footwear from stylish heels to your favorite flats!
LENGTH - This high waist pant comes in 2 lengths; 30 inch regular/average length and 28 inch short length with a 14 1/2 inch leg opening
Effortlessly fun and stylish Gloria Vanderbilt is a versatile yet classic look that attracts and connects with the modern sensibility of consumers of all ages.
Gloria Vanderbilt Women's Shape Effect Pull on High Rise Straight Leg Jean Standard
